TECHSPO Technology Expo

June 14—15, 2017

www.techspo.co

TECHSPO LA is a 2-day technology expo taking place June 14 – 15, 2017 at the luxurious Loews Santa Monica Beach Hotel, Santa Monica, California in the heart of Silicon Beach. TECHSPO LA brings together developers, brands, marketers, technology providers, designers, innovators and evangelists looking to set the pace in our advanced world of technology.

4,000 Attendees

Loews Santa Monica Beach Hotel
